price: Kada ka kira wani abin bautãwa na dabam tãre da Allah. Bãbu abin bautãwa fãce Shi. Kõwane abu mai halaka ne fãce fuskar Sa. Shi ne da hukunci kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku.*
arabic: وَلَا تَدۡعُ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۘ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ كُلُّ شَيۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَجۡهَهُۥۚ لَهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
footnotes: * Wannan ãyã ta ƙarshen sũrar, ta tãra ilmin da sũrar ta karantar a cikin abũbuwa biyar da ta zãna

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā tadʿu maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara lā ilāha illā huwa kullu shayin hālikun illā wajhahu lahu al-ḥuk'mu wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
